author: Amil Niazi,Ania Bessonov
title: Does the virus live on my pet's fur? Your COVID-19 questions answered
description: We're breaking down what you need to know about the pandemic by answering your questions. You can send us your questions via email at COVID@cbc.ca and we’ll answer as many as we can. We’ll publish a selection of answers every weekday on our website, and we’re…
content:
